# Flex Wrap

In hypestyle css you can use the flex-wrap property to wrap the flex items in a flex container.

Class Properties
flex-w-nowrap flex-wrap: nowrap;
flex-w-wrap flex-wrap: wrap;
flex-w-wrap-reverse flex-wrap: wrap-reverse;
Last Updated: 11/24/2021, 9:11:43 PM
